data.prayer: Over 99.57 percent of the people of Noakhali are far from Jesus. Lord, please send your gospel to them through the internet or radio or television today!

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Noakhali, Chittagong, Bangladesh
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Noakhali, Chittagong, Bangladesh a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 798 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the church in the county of Noakhali to increase their prayer for your kingdom to come.
data.verse: Now when Daniel learned that the decree had been published, he went home to his upstairs room where the windows opened toward Jerusalem. Three times a day he got down on his knees and prayed, giving thanks to his God...

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Noakhali, Chittagong, Bangladesh to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Mallik (Hindu traditions) people.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Noakhali, Chittagong, Bangladesh to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Noakhali access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary:
the county of Noakhali, Chittagong, Bangladesh has a population of 3,108,100.

We estimate Noakhali has 3,894 people who might know Jesus, 9,324 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,094,882 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 798 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Noakhali who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

location.name: Noakhali
